name: eliminable2a
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, wff w0
body: |- wb(wceq(cv(s0), cab(s1, w0)), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s2), cab(s1, w0)))))

body.origin:
|- wb(wceq(cv(s0), cab(s1, w0)), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s2), cab(s1, w0)))))
-| diffsc(s2, cv(s0))
-| diffsc(s2, cab(s1, w0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wceq(cv(s0), cab(s1, w0)), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s2), cab(s1, w0)))))
-| diffsc(s2, cv(s0))
-| diffsc(s2, cab(s1, w0))

|- wb(wceq(cv(s0), cab(s1, w0)), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s2), cab(s1, w0)))))
-| diffsc(s2, cab(s1, w0))
-| diffss(s2, s0)

|- wb(wceq(cv(s0), cab(s1, w0)), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s2), cab(s1, w0)))))
-| diffsc(s2, cab(s1, w0))
-| diffss(s0, s2)

body.origin:
|- diffsc(s2, cab(s1, w0))
-| diffss(s2, s1)
-| diffsw(s2, w0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wb(wceq(cv(s0), cab(s1, w0)), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s2), cab(s1, w0)))))
-| diffss(s0, s2)
-| diffss(s2, s1)
-| diffsw(s2, w0)

|- wb(wceq(cv(s0), cab(s1, w0)), wal(s2, wb(wcel(cv(s2), cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s2), cab(s1, w0)))))
-| diffss(s0, s2)
-| diffsw(s2, w0)
-| diffss(s1, s2)

comment: A theorem used to prove the base case of the Eliminability Theorem (see section comment). (Contributed by BJ, 19-Oct-2019.) (Proof modification is discouraged.) (New usage is discouraged.)
